other_tests.findings: Non-epithelioid granuloma and patch mixed lymphocyte infiltration.

other_tests.procedure_name: Duplex scanning of the arteries of the lower limbs
other_tests.findings: Signs of angiopathy in both lower limbs and hemodynamically significant stenosis of 32% at the right posterior tibial artery.

Signs of thrombosis of the sural vein of the right leg, insufficiency of the valves of the great saphenous vein on the leg and the lower third of the thigh, dilation, and insufficiency of the perforating veins of the right and left lower limbs.
